item.title: Republican senators hit border, touting tougher security and tax cuts, in 2026 kickoff
item.description: Senate Republicans visit southern border Friday to showcase border security wins and economic policies ahead of November midterm elections campaign.

item.title: Democratic socialist Mamdani ally mounts bid for US House of Representatives
item.description: Democratic socialist New York state Assemblymember Claire Valdez, an ally of New York City Mayor Zohran Mamdani, has mounted a bid for U.S. House.
